person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I 've also got a contract to play for New South Wales in the Super 12 next year . "

Let's think step by step.

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. I (referring to the speaker)
2. New South Wales (a team or organization)

So, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are the speaker and New South Wales.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. I (referring to the speaker)

So, the only "Person" entity in the paragraph is the speaker, who is referred to by the pronoun "I".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| I |
